meta.name: description
meta.content: A boutique online dance music store of singles and dance compilations where you can download music from the world's greatest record labels.

div.a: Sign up to the Defected Community

div.div: Summer Album Deal. Buy any 3 albums and get the cheapest free! Choose from all classic and current albums* (digital and CD) including this years albums Defected In The House Ibiza 12, Most Rated Miami 12, House Masters - DJ Chus and many more! * excludes pre-order items
Stay updated with the latest special offers and follow us on Twitter and Facebook.

div.p: Defected In The House Ibiza ‘12 is a three mix release showcasing the impressive diversity of house music that Defected now champions. Mixed by the label’s founder Simon Dunmore, taking in upfront tracks from Kings Of Tomorrow, Groove Armada, Flashmob, Kaytronik, Claptone and Roy Davis Jr, this is more than simply a showcase of the latest and greatest, with Dunmore selecting a number of records that have soundtracked his epic journey and career through house music.

UK production duo Copyright have emerged from the shadowy streets beneath the grey skies of London to beam rays of 4/4 happiness into the exultant faces of clubbers around the globe. Since their debut over 10 years ago they’ve come an exceptionally long way, and with productions like ‘You Got Me’ it’s easy to see why. Featuring the vocal talents of long term collaborator Tasita D'Mour, this is a dose of vocally-minded, energetic yet soulful house that oozes elegance and class, and is set to delight dance floors the world over.
